I know this sounds convient, but lately I have been thinking about
converti=
ng the source code into a Java applet.

One of things I have been thinking =
about is the size limitation of the
screen - how much of a map can we see a=
t a time.  

The other problem that I saw was handling saved games.  I have=
 run
into trouble trying to find a way for an applet to write a graphics
fi=
le to local computer.  Loading the file isn't the problem; the
problem I ra=
n into was saving said picture.  I couldn't find the
command to let me save=
 files to a local pc.  Here's the applets that
I've built so far -
http://h=
ome.windstream.net/melvinsh/applets/dph-applets.htm .  My
solution to the s=
aved game problem was involved registration system
where registered users c=
ould save up to 5 games on the host.  It was
looking like a $$$ opportunity=
.

ers on
